function remove_duplicates!(df)
        df.policy[contains.("Drug", df.policy)] .= "Drugs & Substance Misuse"
        df.policy[contains.("Adult Content", df.policy)] .= "Adult Content"
        df.policy[contains.("Bullying", df.policy)] .= "Bullying & Trolling"
        df.policy[contains.("Suicide", df.policy)] .= "Suicide"
        df.policy[contains.("adicalisation", df.policy)] .= "Counter Radicalisation"
        df.policy[contains.("Self", df.policy)] .= "Self Harm"
        df.policy[contains.("Violence", df.policy)] .= "Weapons & Violence"
        df.policy[contains.("Rac", df.policy)] .= "Race & Religious Hatred"
        df.policy[contains.("Sexting", df.policy)] .= "Sexting"
        df.policy[contains.("anguage", df.policy)] .= "LGBT Derogatory Language"
        df.policy[contains.("PORN", df.policy)] .= "Adult Content"
        df.policy[contains.("Porn", df.policy)] .= "Adult Content"
        df.policy[contains.("Drug", df.policy)] .= "Drugs & Substance Misuse"
        df.policy[contains.("Groom", df.policy)] .= "Grooming"
        df.policy[contains.("Eating", df.policy)] .= "Eating Disorders"
        df.policy[contains.("Gambling", df.policy)] .= "Gambling"
        df
    end

    function filter_captures(df)
        df = @select(df, :user, :time, :term, :policy)
        remove_duplicates!(df)
    end

function remove_duplicates!(df)
        df.policy[contains.("Drug", df.policy)] .= "Drugs & Substance Misuse"
        df.policy[contains.("Adult Content", df.policy)] .= "Adult Content"
        df.policy[contains.("Bullying", df.policy)] .= "Bullying & Trolling"
        df.policy[contains.("Suicide", df.policy)] .= "Suicide"
        df.policy[contains.("adicalisation", df.policy)] .= "Counter Radicalisation"
        df.policy[contains.("Self", df.policy)] .= "Self Harm"
        df.policy[contains.("Violence", df.policy)] .= "Weapons & Violence"
        df.policy[contains.("Rac", df.policy)] .= "Race & Religious Hatred"
        df.policy[contains.("Sexting", df.policy)] .= "Sexting"
        df.policy[contains.("anguage", df.policy)] .= "LGBT Derogatory Language"
        df.policy[contains.("PORN", df.policy)] .= "Adult Content"
        df.policy[contains.("Porn", df.policy)] .= "Adult Content"
        df.policy[contains.("Drug", df.policy)] .= "Drugs & Substance Misuse"
        df.policy[contains.("Groom", df.policy)] .= "Grooming"
        df.policy[contains.("Eating", df.policy)] .= "Eating Disorders"
        df.policy[contains.("Gambling", df.policy)] .= "Gambling"
        df
    end

    function filter_captures(df)
        df = @select(df, :user, :time, :term, :policy)
        remove_duplicates!(df)
    end
